title: Rent Based of Income - 2 and 3 Bedrooms - Open Waitlist - Laundry - Pa
posting_body: THANK YOU FOR YOUR INTEREST IN OUR COMMUNITY.
OUR COMMUNITY PROVIDES RENTAL APARTMENTS UNDER THE HUD SECTION 8 AFFORDABLE HOUSING PROGRAM.
THE ACTUAL RENT AMOUNT FOR EACH RESIDENT VARIES BASED ON INCOME.
PLEASE CONTACT OUR OFFICE FOR MORE INFORMATION.
Westway Garden Townhomes is a residential affordable housing community that features 2- and 3-Bedroom Apartments.
Our community has on-site parking, wall-to-wall carpeting, and Laundry Facilities.
We also have an online payment system, if you wish to go paperless!
You will feel right at home at Westway Apartments!
So, come down and see your need home!
Section 8 Rental Assistance – Rent Based on Income
WHO ELSE CAN OFFER YOU ALL THIS?
Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.
Photos may not be of the exact advertised apartment.
Please contact us today for the most up-to-date information!
